channel.title: Patternflow on chryb's blog
channel.description: Recent content in Patternflow on chryb's blog

item.title: User-Friendly Pattern Recognition
item.description: Currently, I’m working on an interesting project based on a university course. It should answer the question if it is possible to combine a good user experience with pattern recognition on n-dimensional time series. Background Before I start with the project I want to write a bit about the definitions. Problems lala test select n-dim data import data / smooth / simplify data visualization algo selection
